data.name: Qingce Cloud Residence
data.description: A mountain hamlet modeled after Qingce Village. It is said that the friendly atmosphere there is infectious and that visitors who enter will find themselves calmed and more appreciative of simple joys that they may have once forgotten.\nTo head out in pursuit of one's ideals and spend one's years magnificently chasing a career is certainly praiseworthy. But after spending so long on such endeavors, one may eventually tire. When that happens, a quiet and peaceful life out in the countryside remains a good choice. Qingce Village has always maintained its acceptance of young folk who head out to seek their fortunes, and is ready to welcome them back with open arms at any time.

text.text: Short and squat wooden houses, sparsely scattered... Sometimes, a village like this can be easier to guard than a city.
When hunting demons, I just want bystanders out of the area, so I can focus on fighting.
...So this is what human construction looks like up close.
Hmm... My notebook doesn't say anything about this place.
But... it's very quiet. I like it. Can I come here often?
I wrote it in my notebook. Thank you.
Livin' a peaceful life in the countryside for years on end sounds suffocatin'.
I'll use my rock 'n' roll to bring 'em a new experience and stir up some long-lost enthusiasm!
No time to waste. C'mon, help me set a stage up!
...The atmosphere in the village is great. I've gotten some poetic inspiration just walking around!
Ooh, do you think we'll see anything interesting after nightfall? Like... a statue coming to life, or an eerie fire underwater...
Hehe... you'll join me, right?
I much prefer tranquil places like this to the constant clamor of the city.
It's somewhere that I can be myself. No distractions.
A life of freedom, leisure, and relative privacy... It seems this appeals to you, too.
This house is similar to a place in Southwest Minlin that I lived in for a while.
Minlin... now that was a smooth operation. Thinking back on it puts me in a good mood.
I should go back and give that place a spring-clean sometime. Never know when it might prove useful again...
Wow, this place is so neat and tidy, it's basically perfect. There's nothing for me to do here at all...
In which case, let's play instead!
I'll get Yuegui to hide somewhere, and you try to find it. Hehe, I play this game with my friends a lot!
